description: There is an undirected tree with n nodes labeled from 0 to n - 1, rooted at node 0. You are given a 2D integer array edges of length n - 1 where edges[i] = [ai, bi] indicates that there is an edge between nodes ai and bi in the tree. At every node i, there is a gate. You are also given an array of even integers amount, where amount[i] represents: The game goes on as follows: Return the maximum net income Alice can have if she travels towards the optimal leaf node.
